title: Undeserved
description: What better motivator than jealousy?Emeka and Ikechukwu: Inseparable friendsLife goal: Get dream jobs and be rich.Ikechukwu’s motive: ability take to care of his widowed mother and his two siblings.Emeka’s motive: To be the god of his clanMeans to achieve their dreams (Emeka and Ikechukwu): Nestle Company.Envy, competition, backbiting, and hatred take center stage as both friends struggle through life, on the journey of finding themselves and attaining the best heights they could.
author: Michael Chukwudi
